document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Visitor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Marl </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">influences </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Flowers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">orderly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Busts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Elegant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Glass </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">visits </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Concludes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">glistening </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">interview </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Caresses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">fingers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">touched </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">run </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">whatsoever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Mouth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">kissed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A visitor in marl
